name: Ikarus
description:
Ikarus

This is a (very short) point-and-click adventure game I made in 3 weeks for the Icehouse jam 2019. 

It is the story of Icarus, son of the genius architect and inventor Daedalus. Daedalus built the famous Labyrinth on Crete that holds the Minotaur. Icarus helps his friend Ariadne to help Theseus, hero of Athens, to kill the Minotaur. Minos, king of Crete, doesn't like this at all...

Features:

classic pointing and clicking  with puzzles , dialogues and inventory

streamlined interface :  leftclick - use, talk, pick up    /   rightclick - look at

texts in English and German  (no voices)
